title: (x) Southern Indiana Plastics, Inc. - ITC Giovanni {Mark S}
content:
Please help me find this font or a similar one.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420145235im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38551.jpg)

 [‹ (x) typeface in Sony ads - FF Blur (stretched) {Jos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420145235/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5250 "Go to previous forum topic") [Potente - How about this one? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420145235/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5239 "Go to next forum topic")
author: asitis

comments.content: I think we're looking at [ITC Giovanni](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420145235/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-giovanni/book/testdrive.html?s=Southern%a0Indiana%a0Plastics%2C%a0Inc.&p=36) here.
Mark isn't easily fooled by fancy-shmancy fax bitmap tactics! ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420145235im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)
I am sometimes surprised at how much you can distort a typeface without distroying its underlying gestalt.
